sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A Compleat collection of papers in twelve parts relating to the great revolutions in England and Scotland from the time of the seven bishops petitioning K. James II. against the dispensing power, June 8. 1688. to the coronation of King William and Queen Mary, April 11. 1689. Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
[418] p.
Printed by J.D. for R. Clavel ... Henry Mortlock ... and Jonathan Robinson ..., London : 1689.
Editorship ascribed to Bishop Burnet. Cf. Lowndes. Each part has special t.p. and separate paging, with pts. 1-5 dated 1688 and pts. 6-12 dated 1689. Pts. 3-12 have imprint: London : Printed, and are to be sold by Richard Janeway ... Pt. 1 lacks any numerical designation and is entitled "A collection of papers ..." Parts that were sold separately are cataloged separately. Cf. Wing. Table of contents: p. [3]-[6]. "Advertisement. All gentlemen, and others, that have bought some of the single parts, may be furnished with what other parts they want to perfect the whole before they bind them up, by the publishers hereof, who, as they find encouragement, will go on with a second volume"--P. [2]. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======

[418] p.
Printed by J.D. for R. Clavel ... Henry Mortlock ... and Jonathan Robinson ..., London : 1689.
Editorship ascribed to Bishop Burnet. Cf. Lowndes. Each part has special t.p. and separate paging, with pts. 1-5 dated 1688 and pts. 6-12 dated 1689. Pts. 3-12 have imprint: London : Printed, and are to be sold by Richard Janeway ... Pt. 1 lacks any numerical designation and is entitled "A collection of papers ..." Parts that were sold separately are cataloged separately. Cf. Wing. Table of contents: p. [3]-[6]. "Advertisement. All gentlemen, and others, that have bought some of the single parts, may be furnished with what other parts they want to perfect the whole before they bind them up, by the publishers hereof, who, as they find encouragement, will go on with a second volume"--P. [2]. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Henry Mortlock
Jonathan Robinson
R. Clavel
J.D.
